course_title: Communication Skills for Advanced Speakers II
course_description: Designed to continue to improve the communication skills of the Advanced (Level 3) student.  Students will practice communicating expertise, knowledge, and skills in their areas of research and general topics of interest. ELSP 518 will facilitate movement from instructor-guided monitoring of communication patterns (as in ELSP 517) to self-monitoring during structured and spontaneous speaking situations.
